title: Ba Da Chu Fan Zhuang
description: Chinese name 八大处饭庄, address 石景山区八大处公园二处. No onion, garlic, chive, shallot, leek, and spring onion. During peak season buffet meals are served at around RMB48, comprising 6 cold dishes, 9 hot dishes, and many staple food such as rice, potato porridge, pancake, and free flow of hot water and carbonated drinks. A la carte dishes available during off-peak season.
